steps.title: Share requirements
steps.description:
Share your event details with us — date, budget, location, 
 venue type, guest count, and any other preferences — so we 
 can craft your perfect celebration

steps.title: Get a presentation
steps.description:
Get the best deal on pricing for venue, decor,
 catering as per your taste

steps.title: Book, Sit back and relax
steps.description:
Secure your date with a small advance within 
 7 days,and let us take care of every detail
